responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "15F4A3CB446FB50B2ABEEB899F94AE17", "While sneaking through the citadel, I spied the Sighted performing a ritual spell upon some barrels of light. I inched closer to see what I can hear and apparently, these are power orbs intended to provide the Deliath with enough arcane strength to raze this realm. ")
name: MADD_0007_Phase04_ThePiper_11
